summary: Replaces the female hoods and hats with male counterpats
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=yellow][size=7] Mod purpose[/size][/color][/b][/center]

This mod is a replacing mod and it will replace the hats/hoods of the 
female with male counterparts (see pics)

[color=green]Mods that are shown above are[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14283/?]SabreKhajiit by JeGe[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44091//?]A Matter of Time - A HUD clock widget by SkyAmigo[/url]
author: Garuger
